name: Everest Metal
overview:
Established in the year 2011 at Jamtara (Jharkhand, India), we, “Everest Metal Abrasives” are a leading manufacturer and supplier of superior quality Wire Shot. Our exclusive range includes Conditional Cut Wire Shot, Conditioned Cut Wire Shot, Steel Cut Wire Shot, High Carbon Steel Cut Wire Shot & Cut Wire Shot., etc.

Our Team: Engineers Technicians Quality controllers Research analysts Procuring agents Marketing representatives Warehouse personnel Skilled workforce

Infrastructure: We have a high-tech manufacturing unit that sprawls over a huge area of land and is well-equipped with advance manufacturing technologies and machines that enables us to manufacture qualitative ranges of products.

Our Quality: Since our inception, quality has always been our foremost objective. Our highly skilled quality experts make us efficient in delivering best quality products to our clients. The offered products are manufactured under the guidance of our quality controllers in compliance with the preset international standards.

Why Us?: We are affluent in the industry for offering supreme quality range of Abrasive and Shots. Our offered range is quality tested and assure high durability, optimum performance, corrosion resistance and longer service life. Due to our ethical business policies and flexibility.
